answers.answer: I couldn't eat for 12 hours before the 1 hour test and then the 3 hour test (i failed the 1st one ).
My doctor allowed me to eat protein ONLY 2 hours before  the test. Nothing with sugar. Eggs would be fantastic.
I have taken the test 5 time the 1 and 2 hr test with my first and second Babies and the 2 hr test just today with my 3rd baby each time I had to fast 12 hrs before the test besides water.
You may want to check with your doctor. I took my test today and I was told not to fast at all, I just ate what I'd normally eat.Sounds like it depends on your doctor's wishes.

question: I have a gestational diabetes test tomorrow at 12:45. How many hours before the test can I eat?
title: gestational diabetes test?
